name: auroraticket
effect: Provides access to Birth Island and deoxys.
short_effect: Allows access to Birth Island and Deoxys.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A ticket required
to board the ship
to BIRTH ISLAND.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A ticket required to board the ship
to BIRTH ISLAND.
It glows beautifully.
